text: Is Caitlyn Jenner thinking about having another child? A wild new report claims she asked Kim Kardashian ’ s surrogate to carry a baby for her. What?! Is Caitlyn Jenner, 68, looking to have another child? A surprising new report from Star claims she reached out to Kim Kardashian ‘ s gestational carrier to bear a child for her using sperm she froze during her marriage to Kris Jenner, 62. Excuse me, what?! If that sounds incredibly farfetched to you, that ’ s because it is. Caitlyn ’ s rep Alan Nierob told Hollywoodlife. com that this report isn ’ t true. Phew! Caitlyn isn ’ t having another kid of her own, but she does have a newborn grandchild! Kylie
